creator: srinivas.dutt@ps.ge.com
text:
if am using log4j-1.2.4.jar then getting the error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/log4j/Basi
cConfigurator

where as if i am using log4j.jar it works fine.
Please respond to me ASAP.
